PHRASE.LANG: Take a deep breath and inhale the soft sweet aroma of the Plum Tree Pavilion. Its gentle landscaping and exquisite architecture makes this space ideal for anyone who’s a fan of fishponds and rock formations. Reward you and your friends with an exclusive Lantern furniture item, only available in the Plum Tree Pavilion Apartment.. [#Legal]

Prenez une profonde respiration et inhaler l'odeur douce douce du Pavillon prunier. Son aménagement paysager doux et architecture exquise fait cet idéal d'espace pour quelqu'un qui a un fan de viviers et de formations rocheuses, de posséder. Récompense vous et vos amis avec un meuble Lanterne exclusifs, uniquement disponibles dans le Pavillon Appartement prunier. [#Legal]

Atme tief ein und inhaliere das weiche, süße Aroma des Pflaumenbaum-Pavillons. Dank der schönen Landschaft und der herrlichen Architektur ist dieser Bereich ideal für alle Fans von Fischteichen und Felsformationen. Belohne dich und deine Freunde mit einem exklusiven Laternen-Möbelstück, das es nur im Pflaumenbaum-Pavillon-Apartment gibt. [#Legal]

Fai un respiro profondo e lasciati inondare dal dolce aroma del Padiglione delle susine. La sua delicata e ricercata architettura del paesaggio rende questo spazio ideale per chiunque ami i laghetti con i pesci e le formazioni rocciose. Ricompensa te e i tuoi amici con un esclusivo oggetto d'arredamento Lanterna, disponibile unicamente nell'Appartamento Padiglione delle susine. [#Legal]

Respira hondo e inhala el aroma suave y dulce del Pabellón del ciruelo. Su paisaje delicado y su exquisita arquitectura convierten este espacio en ideal para todo aquel al que le guste tener estanques de peces y formaciones rocosas. Premia a tus amigos y a ti también con un objeto de mobiliario Farol, solo disponible en el apartamento Pabellón del ciruelo. [#Legal]

Take a deep breath and inhale the soft sweet aroma of the Plum Tree Pavilion. Its gentle landscaping and exquisite architecture makes this space ideal for anyone who’s a fan of fishponds and rock formations, to own. Reward you and your friends with an exclusive Lantern furniture item, only available in the Plum Tree Pavilion Apartment. [#Legal]
크게 숨을 들이쉬고 자두나무 파빌리온의 부드럽고 달콤한 향기를 맡으세요. 이 장소의 아름다운 지형과 독특한 건축은 물고기가 사는 웅덩이와 신기한 돌을 좋아하는 사람이라면 누구나 어울리는 장소입니다. 또한, 자두나무 파빌리온 아파트에서만 제공되는 랜턴 가구 아이템으로 본인과 친구들에게 즐거움을 주세요. [#Legal]

Take a deep breath and inhale the soft sweet aroma of the Plum Tree Pavilion. Its gentle landscaping and exquisite architecture makes this space ideal for anyone who’s a fan of fishponds and rock formations, to own. Reward you and your friends with an exclusive Lantern furniture item, only available in the Plum Tree Pavilion Apartment. [#Legal]
在香氣芬芳的李子樹大樓內深呼吸。其平伏的地勢和獨特的建築，最適合任何喜歡魚塘石景的人。獨家的燈籠家具獎品道具只在李子樹大樓公寓內才可獲得，用來送給自己和好友吧。 [#Legal]
